name: Masjid Mkkai Palayam
description: Masjid Makkai Palayam, located in Kanyakumari district, is a revered Islamic center known for its cultural significance and community spirit. It serves as a place of worship, fostering unity through religious activities, educational programs, and social initiatives. The masjid plays a pivotal role in preserving Islamic traditions and promoting understanding among its diverse worshippers, embodying a sense of spiritual devotion and communal harmony in the local community.
location: 68W8+VP2, Dargha Rd, Chakala, Thuckalay, Tamil Nadu 629175
